definitions.definition: In the International System of Units , the base unit of luminous intensity ; the luminous intensity, in a given direction, of a source that emits monochromatic radiation of frequency 540 × 10 hertz and that has a radiant intensity in that direction of 1/683 watt per steradian . Symbol: cd

main_definition: In the International System of Units , the base unit of luminous intensity ; the luminous intensity, in a given direction, of a source that emits monochromatic radiation of frequency 540 × 10 hertz and that has a radiant intensity in that direction of 1/683 watt per steradian . Symbol: cd
